price: Bununla beraber Biz bunun üstünde olan şeyleri elbet kupkuru bir toprak yaparız.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
